sentence.Network_en: Evidence should only be excluded if its probative value was outweighed by its prejudicial effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果证据的偏见作用超过其证明力,那么只能作废.

PerfectNetExp.abs: probationership 试用期间probative 试用的probe into 探究
证明 - English translation - bab.la... ... 证明为假 to belie 证明的 probative 提供证明的 probative.
鉴定 - English translation - bab.la... ... 鉴定的 critical 鉴定的 probative 专家鉴定 expertise.
...probationer 受缓刑监视者；试用人员；见习人员probative 提供证明的；提供证据的；证明的；鉴定的problem 问题；难题

list.abs: 恰如上文所述,证明价值(probative value)是与证明力(weight)难以界分清楚的概念。从中可以看出,运用最佳证据原理阐释证据法就无法绕开《联邦证据规则》回避的证明力.
on defective evidence and its probative force in criminal proceedings ., 试论刑事诉讼瑕疵证据及其证明力.
...1976,提出了,似真推理,plausible reasoning,史克雷文,1987,提出了,检验推理,probative reasoning,和沃尔顿提出了,假定推理,presumptive reasoning,来作为第三种推理形式,这些学.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (describing something that serves as a test): from Latin probativus, from probat- 'proved', from the verb probare (see prove)

means.word_mean: 1. tending to prove a particular proposition or to persuade you of the truth of an allegation

auth_sentence.content: Judges have a discretion to exclude evidence the prejudicial effect of which...outweighs its probative value.
auth_sentence.res_content: Judges have a discretion to exclude evidence the prejudicial effect of which...outweighs its probative value.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Judges have a discretion to exclude evidence the prejudicial effect of which...outweighs its probative value.

auth_sentence.content: But federal courts instruct juries that circumstantial evidence is just as probative as direct evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: But federal courts instruct juries that circumstantial evidence is just as probative as direct evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But federal courts instruct juries that circumstantial evidence is just as probative as direct evidence.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,大概的;有希望的,可能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: prob测试,证明+able能……的→能证明的
prob测试,证明+ative表形容词→adj.检验的
approbate[v.许可,认可,承认]+ion表名词→n.称赞,认可
dis不+approbation[n.称赞,认可]→n.不答应,非难,不赞成
prob测试,证明+ation表名词→测试→试验
prob测试,证明+e→n.探针,探测器 v.[以探针等]探查,穿刺,查究
prob测试,证明+ity表名词→[人]经得起证明和试验
re反+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏[的人]
ap一再+prob证明+ate表动词→一再证明[可行]→批准
prob测试,证明+e→n.探针,探测器 v.[以探针等]探查,穿刺,查究
re反+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏[的人]
